title: The Grey Heir
description: "Set in the fantastic world of Waerdal, The Grey Heir is a boy-based, young adult, hero’s journey that follows a young merchant’s son, Rayne Drehmer (later Rayne Arcesk), as he’s co-opted into a centuries old conflict between aristocratic mages and the Order of Trel.Used as a pawn by one side and then forcefully conscripted by the other, Rayne must untangle twisted histories to discover where his loyalties should lie in a world where both sides seem at least partially justified. Should he fight for those who seem to be the best caretakers of the world, or those who promote its freedom?"
author: Zachary Katz-Stein
